source.a9b4a93f:
import pandas as pd
import plotly_express as px

df = pd.read_csv('../input/mr-beast-youtube-video-statistics/mr_beast_youtube_stats.csv')
px.scatter(
    data_frame=df,
    x="viewCount",
    y="likeCount",
    color="commentCount",
    height=600,
    width=800,
    hover_data=["title"],
    title="Mr Beast Videos, Likes vs Views",
)
